targets.query:
SELECT mean("ac_output_power_va") * 0.9
 FROM "default" WHERE ("device" = 'voltronic') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)

panels.description: Assumes 50% Discharge maximum on battery bank - To give approx. 3000 Cycles (8Years on bank)

targets.query: SELECT mean("battery_voltage") FROM "autogen"."default" WHERE ("device" = 'voltronic') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(previous)

panels.title: Battery Bank Voltage (V)

targets.query: SELECT (median("ac_output_power_va")  / 1000 )* 24 FROM "autogen"."default" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT  mean("ac_output_power_va") / mean("ac_output_voltage") FROM "autogen"."default" WHERE ("device" = 'voltronic') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
